article_title: Progress In Health Care Is Still 'Excruciatingly Slow' Says Harvard Expert

article_metadata.description: I had the opportunity to interview one of the nation’s foremost experts on pay-for-performance and health care quality measurement, Harvard professor Ashish K. Jha, MD, MPH. His entertaining and insightful blog "An Ounce of Evidence" tops my bookmarks.  He’s known in the business community for his forceful candor on the need [...]
article_metadata.author: Leah Binder
